definition: suffix of a noun of locality
Primorsky Krai (Russian territory whose administrative center is Vladivostok 符拉迪沃斯托克)

sentences.english: Do you still recall the frightful night we crossed the Rio Grande?
sentences.chinese: 你還記得我們穿過邊疆鐵騎軍，那個可怕的晚上嗎？

sentences.english: It's vital goal for Xinjiang Produnction & Construction Corps to safeguard the security of northwestern borders.
sentences.chinese: 保障國家西北邊疆安全是新疆兵團的重要目標。

sentences.english: Finally there is Frontierland, which represents the Old West.
sentences.chinese: 最後一個是邊疆世界，它代表着美國老西部地區。

sentences.english: The soldiers are guarding the border.
Han cavalryman were drawn from Chinese living on the frontiers.
sentences.chinese: 漢朝騎兵是從生活在邊疆的百姓中挑選出的。

sentences.english: The old chancellor who had offended against the emperor was relegated to the distant boundaries of the country.
sentences.chinese: 觸犯了皇帝的老宰相被流放到遙遠的邊疆。

sentences.english: Troops have been sent to defend the borders.
sentences.chinese: 已派出部隊去守衛邊疆。

sentences.english: The frontier has not disappeared with the spanning of the continent, or the end of homesteading.
sentences.chinese: 邊疆沒有隨着大陸的聯合或自耕農場的消失而消失。

sentences.english: But in the history of the opening up of China's border region in Xinjiang, the only two concepts were production and construction.
sentences.chinese: 但在中國的邊疆開拓史上，只有生產建設這兩個概念。

sentences.english: Frontier Classics resurrect long out-of-print gems of frontier history.
sentences.chinese: 邊疆國境的歷史經典復活長外的印刷寶石。
做邊境貿易的邊疆賓館。

sentences.english: From the snow-capped Changbai Mountains down to the vast South China Sea frontier.
sentences.chinese: 從白雪皚皚的長白山下到遼闊的南海邊疆。

sentences.english: Day and night, frontier guards defend our motherland's border areas.
sentences.chinese: 邊防戰士們日日夜夜守衛着祖國的邊疆。

sentences.english: Patriotism is the base of cultural innovation and development of borderland military camps.
sentences.chinese: 愛國主義精神是邊疆軍營文化創新發展的根本。

sentences.english: He would push on to the frontier with a bunch of other Irish chaps .
sentences.chinese: 他和一幫愛爾蘭小夥子一起趕往邊疆。

sentences.english: One of these skits, "The King of Beasts" resembles a traditional frontier prank.
sentences.chinese: 一出滑稽短劇《獸王》酷似傳統的邊疆鬧劇。

definition: to look at sth through a bamboo tube/to have a restricted view
internal trouble and outside aggression (idiom); in a mess both domestically and abroad
Guanzhong plain in Shaanxi, valley of the Wei River 渭河
